Creating a space for new directors to showcase their work

for New Directors/New Films Festival

The New Directors/New Films festival happens each year at the Film Society of Lincoln Center.

Role
Project Lead, Creative Direction, Design
Team
Cottleston Pie, Patronage
Live Site
newdirectors.org

In partnership with MoMA, the festival serves a showcase of first time directors.

Each year, an artist creates a new poster for the festival. The website is meant to reflect the style of that poster and the festival’s branding. We developed the overall look and feel for the festival website in a flexible way that can be easily updated each year to reflect the new festival poster.

  • Changing the minumum wage to a livable wage in Los Angeles for Raise the Wage

  • Designing Paul Allen’s push to Tackle Ebola for Tackle Ebola

  • Designing a web app to allow festival attendees to share ideas for The Feast

Commitment to Good

Giving back is essential to Cottleston Pie. From the work that we do with clients, the types of clients and projects that choose to take, and how we spend our time and resources all come back to this core idea. Cottleston Pie exists to make the world a more positive place.

Money talks

10% of Cottleston Pie profits are donated to support an important cause. Each quarter, a different cause is selected and the money is used to support nonprofits, events, and organizations working to support that cause.

This quarter’s cause is Women’s Health. Cottleston Pie donated 10% of profits to the Center for Reproductive Rights to support their fight against the new administration and to protect the fundamental human rights that have come under fire.

Time and expertise

Cottleston Pie is proud to have participated in the Civic Labs Delta.NYC pilot program in 2016, where talented people donate their time to collaborate with other digital professionals and work with an organization to improve their digital product. The project benefited Build NYC, an incredible group of people who are mentoring high schoolers in entrepreneurship.

Cottleston Pie is led by Dave Dawson

Based out of Small City in Gowanus, Brooklyn
